entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
